DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether cognitive behavioral therapy (CG-CBT) for complicated grief is superior to wait list condition in patients with comorbid complicated grief. To evaluate the effect pre-post changes for patients in the CG-CBT-group will be compared to changes in the wait list group.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Complicated Grief
DOC.criteria: age complicated grief diagnosis acute suicidality
